data.title: Muhtadee Billah College (Fees & Reviews) Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei, Jalan Pasar Gadong
data.meta_description: Why Duli Pengiran Muda Al-Muhtadee Billah College? 25,000+ Parent Reviews, Tuition Fees, Ratings, Curriculum | Jalan Pasar Gadong | The college was first established in November 1974 formerly known as Sixth Form Centre and was located at Paduka Seri Begawan Malay College, Jalan Muara,
data.text:
The college was first established in November 1974 formerly known as Sixth Form Centre and was located at Paduka Seri Begawan Malay College, Jalan Muara, Brunei Darussalam. It moved to the current campus in 1979, renamed as Maktab Duli Pengiran Muda Al-Muhtadee Billah on 17th April 1986 by the Crown Prince Haji Al-Muhtadee Billah; and now it is fondly known as 'Maktab Duli'. The college is a premier public co-ed higher learning institution catering specifically for students pursuing their pre-university education leading to AS and A-level examinations.

Since its establishment, Maktab Duli has been successfully and consistently producing high rates amongst it students. The college has an excellent reputation of having achieved consistently high student success rates among its students, with most of its graduates had been awarded scholarships to enable them to pursue their university educations and many are now holding various senior positions both in the Government and private sectors.

Today Maktab Duli has a select student population of 1500, and a qualified and motivated teaching staff of 142 comprising at least 6 different nationalities from all over the world. Nevertheless, 85% of these teaching staff are local Bruneians. In keeping with our mission in providing quality education to our students, Maktab Duli is undergoing professional upgrading programme, where the mission is to ensure that all teachers have the right professional and academic background to teach at A-level, in order to keep up with the more challenging and demanding 21st century teaching and learning.
